channel.title: Attack back :O
channel.description: hey... i am relly annoyd about this problem... when somone attack me i don't attack back... i turn on the attack back button but it still don't attack back. ppls in my last server with this source and client hated when they afk'ed and there was a npc lvl 50 wich attacked them in a random event on my server and they died... if they could have attacked back they would have won.... how to make you attack back???

item.title: Attack back :O
item.dc:creator: @kneistol kneistol
item.description:
@kneistol wrote:

hey… i am relly annoyd about this problem…
when somone attack me i don’t attack back…
i turn on the attack back button but it still don’t attack back.
ppls in my last server with this source and client
hated when they afk’ed and there was a npc lvl 50 wich attacked them
in a random event on my server and they died…
if they could have attacked back they would have won…
how to make you attack back???

Read full topic
